SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.decks

Class DeckLoader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.decks.DeckLoader
public class DeckLoader extends Object
This class creates the immutable decks by reading the JSON files in the resources. The immutable decks are used as a starting point to create different shuffled decks for every individual game. The class is implemented with the Singleton design pattern to ensure that only one DeckLoader instance is created. See the following path for resources: src/main/resources/.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeckLoader

      private DeckLoader()
      Constructs a new DeckLoader instance. It initializes the Gson object with custom type adapters for the different card types to handle JSON serialization and deserialization. The Gson object is set to pretty printing to enhance readability.

    • loadResourcesFromJson

      private List<ResourceCard> loadResourcesFromJson()
      Finds the path to the JSON file containing the resource cards and reads it as a stream that is converted into a list of cards.
      Returns:
      the list of resource cards See the following path for the resourcesCards JSON file: src/main/resources/resourceCards.json.

      Returns:
      the list of gold cards See the following path for the goldCards JSON file: src/main/resources/goldCards.json.
